00067 static L_Alloc_Pool *heapNodePool = NULL;

00076   node.element = a->element;

00088                                    node.weight = (a)->weight; \
00089                                    node.element = (a)->element; \
00090                                    (a)->weight = (b)->weight; \

00098 static void
00099 HeapifyMax (Heap * root)
00100 {
00101   HeapNode *left, *right, *current, *largest;
00102 
00103   current = root->heap;
00104 
00105   while (1)
00106     {
00107       left = current->left;
00108       right = current->right;
00109 
00110       if ((left != NULL) && (left->weight > current->weight))
00111         largest = left;
00112       else
00113         largest = current;
00114 
00115       if ((right != NULL) && (right->weight > largest->weight))
00116         largest = right;
00117 
00118       if (largest != current)
00119         {
00120           Heap_NodeSwap (current, largest);
00121           current = largest;
00122         }
00123       else
00124         return;
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 static void
00129 HeapifyMin (Heap * root)
00130 {
00131   HeapNode *left, *right, *current, *smallest;
00132 
00133   current = root->heap;
00134 
00135   while (1)
00136     {
00137       left = current->left;
00138       right = current->right;
00139 
00140       if ((left != NULL) && (left->weight < current->weight))
00141         smallest = left;
00142       else
00143         smallest = current;
00144 
00145       if ((right != NULL) && (right->weight < smallest->weight))
00146         smallest = right;
00147 
00148       if (smallest != current)
00149         {
00150           Heap_NodeSwap (current, smallest);
00151           current = smallest;
00152         }
00153       else
00154         return;
00155     }
00156 
00157 }

00159 /*
00160  * Create a new Heap 
00161  */
00162 Heap *
00163 Heap_Create (int dir)
00164 {
00165   Heap *new_heap;
00166 
00167   if (heapNodePool == NULL)
00168     heapNodePool = L_create_alloc_pool ("HeapNode", sizeof (HeapNode), 512);
00169 
00170   new_heap = (Heap *) malloc (sizeof (Heap));
00171   new_heap->heap = NULL;
00172   new_heap->size = 0;
00173   new_heap->dir = dir;
00174 
00175   return (new_heap);
00176 }
00177 
00178 /*
00179  * Free up an existing heap, if passed a function pointer
00180  * (i.e. if element_dispose != NULL) this function will 
00181  * also free up the space allocated to each element
00182  */
00183 Heap *
00184 Heap_Dispose (Heap * root, void (*element_dispose) (void *))
00185 {
00186   HeapNode *node, *parent;
00187 
00188   if (root == NULL)
00189     return (NULL);
00190 
00191   node = root->heap;
00192   while (node != NULL)
00193     {
00194       if (node->left != NULL)
00195         {
00196           node = node->left;
00197         }
00198       else if (node->right != NULL)
00199         {
00200           node = node->right;
00201         }
00202       else
00203         {
00204           parent = node->p;
00205           if ((element_dispose != NULL) && (node->element != NULL))
00206             {
00207               (*element_dispose) (node->element);
00208             }
00209           if (parent != NULL)
00210             {
00211               if (parent->left == node)
00212                 parent->left = NULL;
00213               else
00214                 parent->right = NULL;
00215             }
00216           L_free (heapNodePool, node);
00217           node = parent;
00218         }
00219     }
00220   free (root);
00221   return (NULL);
00222 }
00223 
00224 /* 
00225  * Insert the <element> with key <weight> into the heap 
00226  */
00227 void
00228 Heap_Insert (Heap * root, void *element, double weight)
00229 {
00230   HeapNode *ins_node;
00231   int ins_pt = 0;
00232   int size;
00233 
00234   ins_node = root->heap;
00235 
00236   size = ++root->size;
00237   while (size >= (1 << ins_pt))
00238     ++ins_pt;
00239   --ins_pt;
00240 
00241   while (ins_pt > 1)
00242     {
00243       if (size & (1 << --ins_pt))
00244         ins_node = ins_node->right;
00245       else
00246         ins_node = ins_node->left;
00247     }
00248 
00249   if (size == 1)
00250     {
00251       ins_node = root->heap = (HeapNode *) L_alloc (heapNodePool);
00252       ins_node->p = NULL;
00253     }
00254   else if (size & 1)
00255     {
00256       ins_node->right = (HeapNode *) L_alloc (heapNodePool);
00257       ins_node->right->p = ins_node;
00258       ins_node = ins_node->right;
00259     }
00260   else
00261     {
00262       ins_node->left = (HeapNode *) L_alloc (heapNodePool);
00263       ins_node->left->p = ins_node;
00264       ins_node = ins_node->left;
00265     }
00266   ins_node->element = element;
00267   ins_node->weight = weight;
00268   ins_node->right = ins_node->left = NULL;
00269 
00270   if (root->dir == HEAP_MAX)
00271     {
00272       while (ins_node != NULL && ins_node->p != NULL &&
00273              ins_node->p->weight < weight)
00274         {
00275           Heap_NodeSwap (ins_node, ins_node->p);
00276           ins_node = ins_node->p;
00277         }
00278     }
00279   else
00280     {
00281       while (ins_node != NULL && ins_node->p != NULL &&
00282              ins_node->p->weight > weight)
00283         {
00284           Heap_NodeSwap (ins_node, ins_node->p);
00285           ins_node = ins_node->p;
00286         }
00287     }
00288 }

00290 /*
00291  * Retrieve the element at the top of the heap
00292  */
00293 void *
00294 Heap_Top (Heap * root)
00295 {
00296   if (root->size >= 1)
00297     return (root->heap->element);
00298 
00299   return (NULL);
00300 }
00301 
00302 /*
00303  * Retrieve the weight of element at the top of the heap
00304  */
00305 double *
00306 Heap_TopWeight (Heap * root)
00307 {
00308   if (root->size >= 1)
00309     return (&(root->heap->weight));
00310 
00311   return (NULL);
00312 }
00313 
00314 /*
00315  * Extract the element at the top of the heap 
00316  */
00317 void *
00318 Heap_ExtractTop (Heap * root)
00319 {
00320   void *heap_max;
00321   HeapNode *rm_node;
00322   int rm_pt = 0;
00323   int size = root->size;
00324 
00325   if (size < 1)
00326     return (NULL);
00327   heap_max = root->heap->element;
00328 
00329   rm_node = root->heap;
00330   while (size >= (1 << rm_pt))
00331     ++rm_pt;
00332   --rm_pt;
00333 
00334   while (rm_pt > 1)
00335     {
00336       if (size & (1 << --rm_pt))
00337         rm_node = rm_node->right;
00338       else
00339         rm_node = rm_node->left;
00340     }
00341   if (size == 1)
00342     {
00343       root->size = 0;
00344       L_free (heapNodePool, root->heap);
00345       root->heap = NULL;
00346       return (heap_max);
00347     }
00348   else if (size & 1)
00349     {
00350       rm_node = rm_node->right;
00351       rm_node->p->right = NULL;
00352     }
00353   else
00354     {
00355       rm_node = rm_node->left;
00356       rm_node->p->left = NULL;
00357     }
00358   root->heap->weight = rm_node->weight;
00359   root->heap->element = rm_node->element;
00360   --root->size;
00361   L_free (heapNodePool, rm_node);
00362 
00363   if (root->dir == HEAP_MAX)
00364     HeapifyMax (root);
00365   else
00366     HeapifyMin (root);
00367 
00368   return (heap_max);
00369 }
